title: Recruiting in all roles (except jungle and mid) for Upcoming Tournament
body:
As the title says, we are looking for a Top and Bottom Lane Roles, Looking for eager and enthusiastic players who have good game knowledge (map awareness) and a lot of spare time to play as a team and practice.
List Below your;

Summoner Name:

Role:

Top 3 Champions in Role:

Reason why you want to be in a team:

What can you bring to the team:


 Add me in game on "MrsHiPPYx" or simply reply to this post if interested and we'll get back to you ASAP.

replies.body: Dude your bronze 4 you should concentrate more on trying to rank up than a tournament

I'm sorry i don't remember asking for your conjecture i clearly said "simply reply to this post if interested and it seems as if u are just hear to denigrate me! I don't think rank demonstrates a players skill by its self.
